Miscellaneous

Horizontal rules

Rule colors

For customize colors, add class blue, green, orange, red, grey or black beside the rule class.

Rule sizes

Add class size-1 to size-10 to change the rule sizes.

Border styles

Rule provides some border styles. Add a class dotted, dashed, double, groove or ridge to change the border styles.

The default style is solid.

Use class separator instead of rule if you want to add more margin top & bottom on the rule.

Caret colors

Caret directions

Caret sizes
